channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Evacuations ordered as wildfire burns in foothills of national forest east of LA
item.description: Mandatory evacuations are expanding as a wildfire burns in the foothills of a national forest east of Los Angeles.

item.title: Former director of Los Alamos National Laboratory dead after car crash in New Mexico
item.description: A former top official in U.S. nuclear weapons research at Lawrence Livermore and Los Alamos national laboratories has died after an automobile crash in New Mexico.

item.title: Evacuations ordered as wildfire burns in foothills of national forest east of LA
item.description: Evacuations have been ordered as a wildfire burns in the foothills of a national forest east of Los Angeles.
